price: (27) And there will remain the Face[1597] of your Lord, Owner of Majesty and Honor.
arabic: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wayabqā wajhu rabbika dhū al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
